text: Freefolk? Cool! Never heard of them but their reel looks cool and it's definitely a cool experience to start from a smaller place where you can do a lot of things. Do you have any reel or something?
The lodge? What is it about? Is it something long and ambitious? :slightly_smiling_face:
And sure no worries, I'm happy to help and answer any of your questions. BTW do you listen to Allan McKay podcast?

Oh yea I have my reel at, <http://medcalfw.com|medcalfw.com>, still a load of stuff I'm going to change when soon once I've got some more work finished,
The lodge is my final year film made by 6 of us at the uni, it's quite ambitious I would say but it's only about 3 minutes 30 been super fun to make if you want to have a look its all on here <https://www.3dhit.co.uk/forums/topic/30031-the-lodge-vfx-short-film/page/6/>
ohh ive not heard about that podcast, but ive just had a google so il give it a listen sounds great

sadly its gonna be super difficult for me to work in the future as we just found out that our university will be shutting down next week, including all the buildings with the PCs we use in, so its gonna be super difficult to work on my reel
